project.description: This project used to publish mindspore website code to website; this is 2th step;1th stepâ€˜s program is mindspore-website-publish-02 in Mindspore;

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: INPUT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: get previous job value of IMAGE_VERSION

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e
GIT_EMAIL="dakang_siji@189.cn" IMAGE_VERSION=${INPUT} PROJECT_NAME="mindspore-website-publish-git-push-code"
cd $WORKSPACE
if [ -d "infra-mindspore" ]; then rm -rf "infra-mindspore" fi
if hash git 2> /dev/null; then git clone git@github.com:dakangsiji/infra-mindspore.git cd infra-mindspore/applications/website else echo "git is not existing" fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore/mindspore-website=swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/mindspore/mindspore-website:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
cd ../../
git add . git commit -m "update mindspore-website image to mindspore-website:$IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all echo "commit all"
